targets.query: SELECT "message" FROM "monitoring"."helix_alerts" WHERE ("source" = 'oracle_rman_status' AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "metric", "source", "managed_object", "severity"

SELECT "message" FROM "monitoring"."helix_alerts" WHERE ("source" = 'oracle_rman_status' AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "metric", "source", "managed_object", "severity"

panels.title: Number Of Sessions Per Wait Class/State

targets.query: SELECT "used_pcnt" AS "Used percent", "alloc_mb" AS "Alloc MB", "used_mb" AS "Used MB", "free_mb" AS "Free MB", "datfiles_num" AS "DataFiles#" FROM "monitoring"."oracle_tablespace" WHERE ("env" =~ /^$env$/ AND "tablespace" =~ /^$tablespace$/ AND "dbsid" =~ /^$sid$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "env", "tablespace"

list.definition: show tag values from oracle_status with key = "env"
list.label: Env
list.name: env
list.query: show tag values from oracle_status with key = "env"

list.definition: show tag values from oracle_status with key = "sid" where env =~/$env/
list.label: Oracle SID
list.name: sid
list.query: show tag values from oracle_status with key = "sid" where env =~/$env/

list.definition: show tag values from oracle_tablespace with key = "tablespace" where env =~/$env/
list.label: Tablespace
list.name: tablespace
list.query: show tag values from oracle_tablespace with key = "tablespace" where env =~/$env/
